ModMetaData.name: TMaterials - Glass
ModMetaData.description:
Glass can be smelted from stone chunks or stone blocks, and combined with plasteel or silver to create tempered or clear glass.
Anything that can be made out of metal can be made out of glass. Most things built/made out of glass will be transparent (except armors).
Adds two research projects - glass and clear glass. Research requirements can be disabled in mod settings if you have XML Extensions.
